name: proto-bow-buddy
description: A mobile app for keeping track of your score in archery for 3D parcours.

scripts.build-sass: node-sass -o dist --source-map true --output-style expanded --indent-type space --indent-width 2 src/styles
scripts.watch-sass: node-sass -w -o dist --source-map true --output-style expanded --indent-type space --indent-width 2 src/styles
scripts.clean: for f in $(ls dist); do if [ $f != 'index.html' ] && [ $f != 'sw.js' ] && [ $f != 'site.webmanifest' ] && [ $f != 'icon.png' ] && [ $f != 'favicon.ico' ]; then rm -rfv dist/$f; fi; done

author: Christoph Matscheko
